评论详情: For inexpensive workout leggings, these are really nice. The fit is great - bought my usual size and it fit perfectly. From the pictures, I was concerned that they were going to hit above the ankles, when I was looking for full length. They are full length, with a 27” inseam. The fabric is full coverage and very stretchy but not too heavy. I think they’ll be great for yoga, strength training, and cardio. I’ll definitely be ordering more.

评论概述: High quality legging at a great price
评论详情: These are perfect leggings for workout. They are identical to higher priced workout clothes for fraction of the cost. Buttery soft, not see thru, perfect workout pants.

I bought the hot pink color legging. I’m a size 10, 148 lbs. The size medium fit firm around the waist area, but not uncomfortable. It just keeps everything smooth and sucks you in around the waist area, without being oppressively tight or creating a muffin top. I think the leggings are great, but I had to take off one star because the material is sheer. I wore white underwear underneath with a very light design, and you could clearly see my underwear through the legging. And I don’t have a big posterior, so it’s not due to excessive stretching of the fabric. I only ordered the pink color, so I can’t speak to darker colors sheerness level. But the hot pink is a fabulous color! And I will still wear it with a tunic length top or longer oversized sweatshirt or sweater.

Leggings are thick. So perfect for working out to not be see through. They do seem to be sized a little big. I am a large 8/10 and these are a touch big in the waist and around the ankles. Definitely could have worn a medium.  They have washed well so far!
Love the fit love the way they wash . These are definitely a great find !!!
I love the color excellent value for the money good quality and soft and a great fit  Yours Truly Dr Geraldine Dotson

These leggings are great for bloated tummies. The fabric doesn't role down which is very uncomfortable. These leggings have generous room in the legs and stomach. They fit nicely and I'm going to be wearing them daily after I order more pairs.

They’re not thin, but somehow they manage to show everything anyway. You may as well wear your underwear on the outside, that’s how well you can see it. The inconsistent compression serves to create rolls where you don’t even have them, while not actually doing the job of compressing, overall. The seam across the butt is too low and gives early 2000’s low-rise flat butt look. They’re too big for me, others say they’re too small or short, so suffice to say sizing is inconsistent.
You get what you pay for. Thin material. Rolls at the waist. Not flattering.

评论概述: NO POCKET - Well - The pocket might hold a key, but not a card and NOT a phone!
评论详情: Alleged pocket is a little slit in the waistband that might hold a key. Material is nice. Fit is a little big. But the only reason I bought these was for a pocket and that is VERY absent. Returning.
Love these very durable and true to size. Did not give a 5 because they don’t have a pocket. Need a pocket for phone or house key or money.

These are very soft to the touch.  They are a nice weight and are definitely NOT see through.  Because they have a higher percentage of elastane, I ordered a bigger size than normal.  I am 5' 7" and weigh 210 and an XXL fit great.  One size smaller would have provided more compression, but then they would have been uncomfortably tight on me.

I guess I might be average height with a short torso or something because these things come halfway up my rib cage. It's awkward because they hit right in the middle of a baby-induced spare tire which of course makes me extremely self-conscious as well as uncomfortable physically in them. I thought in the pictures it went up to most of the women's naval, but I wasn't expecting it to be this high up on me.  The fabric is thick at least in the black ones and not see through from what I can tell so far. If it fits you right, it's probably okay. The fit is snug in the legs not loose like some of the other reviews said but then I do have larger legs.  I can't see wearing these though since they come up to an uncomfortable spot. I'm 5'7 and presumably a shorter torso then. Keep this in mind when ordering.
Made a good layering piece for wet cold weather.
A-OK
These are so cozy and comfortable i’m planning on getting in every color available

So many of my favorites from Amazon Essentials are going out of stock gradually I was shocked to see these newbies, and pleased!  Ordered a few pair but kept only one because the pink was too good to pass up.  The good: I'm a solid 6x/30 at Torrid, bottom heavy with big booty, hips and tummy, smaller waist.  These fit great.  At 5'4" they come to my ankle.  Rise is perfect even with my massive curves.  One pair sent to me was accidentally a 5x; if I thought I could size down I found out the hard way that is NOT true.  The waist was enough smaller that it would have popped stitches to pull them over my booty.  Two gripes: 1) These are slippery like an athletic legging whereas I wish they had a softer feel and better rebound.  Perhaps more cotton content or maybe microfiber like my favorite tights.  2) For my build, the calves and ankles were too big but not tremendously so.  Again, with more rebound in the fabric that part could have been cut smaller and really fit to the leg.  All things considered, and for how hard it is to find decent clothes this size, kudos Amazon and I recommend.  I do not recommend wearing them in summer, they get pretty slimy.  :)

I don’t love the material this is made out of. I use it for spin class and I’m constantly sliding forward. The color is very bright but it’s a great active wear piece to have especially when we are doing 80s or 90s themes.
These leggings are very nice material! They are a good weight! They fit true to size and the colors are very pretty! I bought a second pair! The price is good value!
I will be ordering more of these, they are amazing and feel so good. They stay up, no sag, they are perfect for me.

评论概述: Fantastic, well made leggings! A bargain!
评论详情: Great, no frills leggings! Nice, navy blue Lycra…kind of a “satin” look…not shiny, but not matte either. Nice length for a tall girl like me; I’m 5’11”, which is hard to find. They’re very similar to my favorite 90 degree reflex leggings which are the only other ones that give me a nice length. They hold up great in hot yoga and wash well. I tumble dry them on low and they’ve held their color and length beautifully. I continue to be pleasantly surprised and pleased with all of my Amazon essentials purchases!

These leggings are a great value. Good fit, smooth fabric, nice length and high waist. wish they had pockets though.  My only complaint is that the fabric ‘squeaks’ when I walk. I might be the only one who hears it, but it’s there.

I used to only buy the old navy power soft leggings but then they changed the way they were made and I had to look for an alternative. I love these. They are very similar to what I liked from old navy. These seem to have a thicker waistband for more compression which I like. The only negative for these is the fact that there’s no pocket on the side but other than that they’re great.

I was so reluctant to buy these. I needed something for my upcoming 5k though cause I'm a heavier person who needs as much coverage as possible. Recommended size per Amazon was 2x but I ordered a 4x and though I may have gotten away w a 3x, for me I feel these are the goldilocks size. I am a normal size pant 26 if that helps. Material feels decent and well made. My biggest disappointment was NO POCKETS. I feel for the price they are an acceptable purchase.

Once again, I bought Amazon basics, my only regret with these is I am 5’3, 205#, these were super long on me, I think I could’ve sized down as they didn’t feel very compressive in the size that I bought was an extra large.
No support at all The waist rolls They're just leggings.
The fit is great! The quality is amazing! I bought another pair and will probably buy more!
I bought these specifically because it says there are pockets. They have no pockets!!

Comfortable, good seams, quality fabric that’s not too thick or thin. The fit seems well proportioned, but this runs small. I’m always a medium in bottoms but these are much too tight and will require that I order a size up.

评论概述: Full length on me were shorter than I liked
评论详情: Don’t like the high waisted pants as I’m short waisted and they aren’t comfortable.

this is great for a workout or around the house. It is high-waisted and the hold on it, it's what I was looking for. For this price, I am willing to buy all the colors I can. I did leave out one star that's because I felt the compression overall was less than I expected. But I will definitely go from buying $38 dollar workout leggings to this, they are so worth it.
I've gotten three different colors and the red length is off in one leg shorter, so I pull them up for Cyprus.  Only wish they had pockets.

评论概述: Material Not as Advertised....Made for Giants
评论详情: Just because I'm overweight doesn't mean I'm also 6'7'. Don't advertise product as 7/8 crop if it's not. All 3 pair go up to my chest and past my toes. I'm 5'7". Also, don't advertise as the same material (74% Polyester 24% Elastine) as your Core 10 products when it's not the same material.
Its not flattering… fits my waist then loose around my knees and hips
Beautiful color, but way too sheer. You could see right through them. Returned
These are actually really comfortable.  The color is as it appears.  Fit true to size. Unsure if they last long because I have only worn them once. I highly recommend for comfort.

These are the heavy material that look and feel like leggings and not tights. They move well with you and look great. The colors are beautiful 😍 They run a little bit tight so in general order your normal size but if you’re on the fence go up one
Love these. The are high waisted. Fit true to size. They do not roll down at the waist like some do. Recommend these 100%. Planning to get more

评论概述: the style just didn't work for me
评论详情: I love the color but style was too high-waisted for me. and it was just not a good look. sorry

They are comfortable and heavy duty; but they don't fit like leggings are supposed to. Instead of a snug fit, these are almost like a pair of slacks. My legs are not skinny by any means.  I only paid 11 bucks, thankfully.

I’m 5’ weigh 100lbs ordered XS -  I love these leggings!!!  Great fit!  They stay up without having to constantly pull them up. I own  multiple pairs and multiple colors. I can dress these up or dress them down.  These are my fav!!!!  Really like the Wide waist band. Wear great look great.
I ordered these because I need some pink pants to wear to the Barbie premiere (NEED!!) and these are completely see through. The color is perfect though!
Comfortable, nice fit  & love the color

评论概述: These run very small compared w/ the measurements given
评论详情: I've returned two pair.  Hope the third will fit.  So far I've found these to run very small compared to the measurements given in sizing.  I'd suggest ordering up.
See through

评论概述: The Best Leggings for the price
评论详情: They are very comfortable, and giving where they need to . I only wish they would of had pockets
Love the color and fit! They are also super soft and smooth. Very nice.

评论概述: Not what they used to be.
评论详情: Poor quality. Waited months for the size medium in black high waisted full length to be available. Waste of money. Thread unraveling in seams after one wear.
returned bc the crotch fit weird, waist was too high, and overall material wasn't great

I find these leggings to be super comfy, and I LOVE the brightness of the pink, but the issue that I have with these is that the fabric is a little thin. You can see the texture of my cellulite through these leggings, just as you could if I didn't even have on leggings. I wish these had a bit more compression to help with that.
Well I didn't like the color as expected and it was kinda bigger in the grouch and it was sent to me in a see through back throwed up on my porch anybody could get it.
They fit and I haven't had any problems with them so.

Loved how these fit, they are super comfy and hug in all the right places. Dryer safe without shrinking. I do wish the waistband was slightly more snug but I usually always have a problem with that as I have bigger hips and thighs than my waist
I love the material and stretch to them. Only thing that could make them perfect are pockets. I love them though
Color

These fit great, look great, feel great! BUT you can absolutely see right through them even while not squatting or stretching them. I'm keeping them to workout at home but they'll never see the light of day sadly!
i love these leggings!! i’m tall and curvy, and these consistently fit and don’t wear out. highly recommend!!!
I loved these leggings - fit & feel was great, BUT there’s a hole near the seam after only 4 or 5 wears. Yes I work out a lot, but I’ve never had quality leggings wear out on me like that.
Very pretty color. Gotten many compliments on them however, they are kinda see threw in the back.
The pink leggings were more neon then I had hoped and were see through.
The only issu I have is the waist will roll. Other than that they met expectations
These I think run big. I did not keep them, but if I ordered again I'd order down a size. Cute and good quality though.
They fit perfectly! Would definitely buy again in different colors!!

Loved these. I am in between 2 sizes and almost always order a size up because I don’t like anything tight. The bigger size was too big and I ended up gifting them to a friend and ordering a size down because I liked them so much. Great quality, thick fabric.
The best pants ever/ perfect fit / high quality/ wash well/ never fade/ keep their fit/ come in different lengths ( I need long or extra long).  Big problem they are almost Always on back order
Great for exercise!
Fit great!  Extremely comfortable.  Ordered size 2x.
The color, vivid. The fit, true to size. The feel, silky smooth

评论概述: Not the same as the ones I bought before.
评论详情: Repeat purchase, a bit disappointed in these as they are not the same fabric or fit as the previous ones. I ended up returning. These were larger, and the fabric is thinner, so if you are looking for some smoothing control this isn't it.

I wear leggings for barre classes five days a week, but still struggle with what size to order. Large was suggested for my size(5’5, 165ish😉, skinny and toned legs, but carry weight in my tummy), but they were so loose behind the knees and in the seat that they looked like pants 😂 Returned for the Medium and they are perfect! Hold me in, feel great, and don’t roll 🙌🏻 And they are my favorite shade of pink! Will be ordering in other colors!
Perfect fit and comfort I live in these things wonderful
I'm not sure who is deciding sizes but look like someone just throw a dart... Go back in morning
These are my teenage daughters  favorite leggings. They fit perfectly and are so comfortable.
Nice fit, not a high quality legging as materiel is a little thin but good for lounging around the house
I returned. I think they would work great for just lounging but I wanted to use these for working out. Kept having to pull them up even just walking around the house.
I love these leggings!  I'm new to the world of athleticwear but they're super comfy, stretchier than other activewear leggings I own, and they quite honestly surprised me.  Highly recommend!

About a year ago I bought these in the blue color and absolutely loved them so I had been waiting for a restock so that I could finally get them in more colors in my size. For prime day I ordered the pink ones and when they came they weren’t the same leggings at all. I’ve only worn them once and the seam down the butt completely ripped. I then went to check my blue pair and the seam had ripped on that one too! I’m so sad because I love the colors but it’s not worth it for me to buy it again if it’s only going to last for one wear.
Soft and stretchy. Perfect to wear on a fall day. Seems to be well made.
Bought for my daughter. Tons of color and durable. They have held up great after washing.
I wear a size xxl normally. These run a bit big so if you are on the size cusp, be aware. I’m normally an 18/20
I received my order but disappointed….. no pockets!!!
Love the color and price.
Comfortable.
I bought this for My daughter 12 year old daughter and she loves these leggings I got them for her in xs and they fit great 💓

Great fit. Great compression. Will split at gusset after several wears and washes. I bought these in February. It’s now June. I’ve worn twice per week for working out and doing housework. Each of the four pairs I ordered have now split at the gusset in the seat where the front meets the back. They were good while they lasted.
The material was great for early spring and early fall or just on those lower evenings when you need them.
Great value for your money! They’re comfortable, flattering, and squat proof. Just wish they had pockets, but would still 100% recommend.

评论概述: Awesome fit, great quality, high rise
评论详情: These are so comfortable! They're thicker than expected and they aren't see-through. I used them for a genie costume. I'm a size 16-18 in pants and the XL fit perfectly.

These run large. I ordered my normal size and they fell down all day! They are loose fitting on my thighs and calves. Definitely size down. I am plus size and short so I had to cuff them up. I may try in a smaller size.
Fit well for a costume.
Good for exercise
Pretty bright pink. Very thin fabric, sending back.
They were sleek and soft and fit well. The color (navy) was on point And the thickness was perfect not to thin or to thick
Fit well. Quality fabric. Pretty too!
I am 5.9 and these pants run short. They hit me way above my ankle.  Material is soft and silky. The color is nice I got khaki green.
I love these leggings, they are a little thicker than some others, but I like the snug fit. I use them a lot when I am flying.
material was nice weight
These are super comfy athletic (or athleisure) bottoms and I highly reccomend them!

评论概述: They are ok if you wear a long top with them
评论详情: I feel like they ran a little short in the crouch area making them less flattering and there is a seam across  the pants that is where the waistband is attached and it's kind of thick so shows through with a fitting top

评论概述: It says Womens but mine was youth size
评论详情: I was disappointed, I'm 5'6" at 170lbs. 34- 31-42. I ordered a large and the waist part of the pants could not make it past my thighs. I gave it to my 10 yo daughter to try on ams it almost fits her perfectly. So I ended up giving it to her. But yeah no this definitely did NOT work out for me.
